txt.en: You have been tasked with collecting treasures from a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'We have recently unlocked the hidden vault of Agbash-khalt. The vault seems to be filled with traps, though I hope that we were able to deactivate them all. Now it must be searched for treasures!

'You are to travel to the vault of Agbash-khalt and search the hall for valuable treasures. Tread carefully, for there could be other traps within! For Gundabad!'

'Behold! The vault of Agbash-khalt, sealed and hidden to all those who have occupied Gundabad, has now finally revealed itself to the Zhélruka Dwarves….\n\n'Your mission is to collect treasures from a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.'
The objective must be completed before time runs out or the mission will fail!
Your mission is to collect treasures from a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel.

'I am glad you have returned no worse for the wear, [placeholder].\n\n'You found even more traps further inside?! I am glad that you kept your wits about you and were able to recover some treasure before the vault closed once more! This treasure will be closely examined and I hope that we will have the vault open again soon. You have my thanks!'
